title: Authors and Citation
text: Donagemma M (2024). praiseme: Deliver Praise Someone. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://matteoqu.github.io/praiseme/, https://github.com/MatteoQU/praiseme.
code: @Manual{,   title = {praiseme: Deliver Praise to Someone},   author = {Matteo Donagemma},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://matteoqu.github.io/praiseme/},   url = {https://github.com/MatteoQU/praiseme}, }

title: Deliver praise — praise
text: name text string; name person need praise. punctuation text string; emphasis text input.

title: Deliver praise — praise
code: praise(name = "Steph", punctuation = "!") #> You're the best, Steph!
